plugins.name: humanize-skills
plugins.description: Remove AI writing patterns from text. Detects and rewrites 24 categories of AI-generated patterns based on Wikipedia's Signs of AI writing guide.

plugins.name: prompt-creator
plugins.description: Expert prompt engineering for AI models (especially Claude). Creates prompts from scratch, improves underperforming prompts, designs system prompts, structures chain-of-thought and few-shot examples, and builds RAG and agentic prompts. Based on Anthropic's official prompt engineering docs.

plugins.name: sql-server-query-tuner
plugins.description: SQL Server query performance tuning. Analyzes execution plans, identifies anti-patterns, recommends indexes, rewrites slow queries, and runs DMV diagnostics against live instances.
